name: Commander Puppy McPaws
description:
This is my entry for Greenlight Jam. Still a work in progress.

Explore the galaxy aboard your spaceship as Commander Puppy McPaws, fullfilling quests for different factions and fight against the BBB (Big Bad Boss) in this sidescroller shoot’em up with roguelite features!

Ideation PhaseDonePrototype PhaseDoneProduction PhasePendingRelease PhasePending

Prototype: HTML5 build and Windows are tested but Linux/OSX ones are provided without testing, sorry.
